name: Falang Q Importer
author: Faboba

sections.description:
Falang is a multilanguage plugin for WordPress. Falang Q Importer will migrate qTranslate/qTranslateX/qTranslateXT data to the Falang system.
The Locomotive plugin (https://github.com/reaktivstudios/locomotive) needs to be installed first.

Supported languages for migration: English, Italian, French, German, Spanish, Russian, Georgian, Swhahili.
If you need support for other languages, just ask for it.
sections.installation:
1. Backup your database
  2. Make sure to backup your database – changes are irreversible
  3. Install the Locomotive plugin
  4. Install the Falang Q Importer plugin
  5. Deactivate the qTranslate plugin
  6. Check your language configuration in Falang (set the same language and same default language as in qTranslate)
    7.Run batches in “Tools > Batches”
sections.faq:
Is Falang Q Importer free?

Yes but without on site support.

Where to find help ?

  • First time users should read Falang – Documentation, which explains the basics with a lot of screenshots.
sections.changelog:
1.7 – 26/01/2022

  • add Khmer km_KH language support
  • add Mandarin zh_CN language support
  • WordPress 5.9 support

1.6 – 19/04/2021

  • add Russian language support
  • add Georgian language support

1.5 – 28/10/2020

  • add swhahili language support
  • add banners
  • add icons

1.4 – 22/06/2020

  • fix taxonomy translation
  • add Spanish support

1.3 – 16/06/2020

  • fix bug with non translated title
  • the target default language can be different from the qTranslate default language

1.2 – 01/06/2020

  • check Falang is installed

1.1 – 19/05/2020

  • update code in class Falang_Q_Importer

1.0

  • Initial release
